trans-unit.source: Reads a forward-only stream of rows from a data source.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源讀取順向資料流的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Closes the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 關閉<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the depth of nesting for the current row.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前資料列的巢狀深度。

trans-unit.source: The outermost table has a depth of zero.
trans-unit.target: 最外層的資料表具有深度為零。

trans-unit.source: The depth of nesting for the current row.
trans-unit.target: 目前資料列的巢狀深度。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`Dispose`當您完成使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`方法會使<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>所佔用。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 永遠呼叫`Dispose`釋放您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>之前

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>

trans-unit.source: Releases the managed resources used by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> and optionally releases the unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 managed 的資源供<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref>並選擇性地釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Close%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of columns in the current row.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前資料列中的資料行數目。

trans-unit.source: Includes hidden fields.
trans-unit.target: 包含隱藏的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.VisibleFieldCount%2A> to exclude hidden fields.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.VisibleFieldCount%2A>以排除隱藏的欄位。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.VisibleFieldCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of columns in the current row.
trans-unit.target: 目前的資料列中的資料行數目。

trans-unit.source: There is no current connection to an instance of SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 沒有目前連接的 SQL Server 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified column as a Boolean.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定資料行的值做為布林值。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的資料行序數。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 指定資料行的值。

trans-unit.source: The specified cast is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的轉換無效。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified column as a byte.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定資料行的值做為位元組。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的資料行序數。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 指定資料行的值。

trans-unit.source: The specified cast is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的轉換無效。

trans-unit.source: Reads a stream of bytes from the specified column, starting at location indicated by dataOffset, into the buffer, starting at the location indicated by bufferOffset.
trans-unit.target: 指定資料行所指示的位置開始讀取的位元組資料流 dataOffset ，緩衝區所指示的位置開始 bufferOffset 。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的資料行序數。

trans-unit.source: The index within the row from which to begin the read operation.
trans-unit.target: 若要開始讀取的作業的資料列內的索引。

trans-unit.source: The buffer into which to copy the data.
trans-unit.target: 要將資料複製到其中的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The index with the buffer to which the data will be copied.
trans-unit.target: 將資料複製到其中的緩衝區索引。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的字元數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The actual number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: 實際讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The specified cast is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的轉換無效。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified column as a single character.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定資料行的值做為單一字元。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的資料行序數。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 指定資料行的值。

trans-unit.source: The specified cast is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的轉換無效。

trans-unit.source: Reads a stream of characters from the specified column, starting at location indicated by dataOffset, into the buffer, starting at the location indicated by bufferOffset.
trans-unit.target: 字元資料流讀取指定資料行所指示的位置開始 dataOffset ，緩衝區所指示的位置開始 bufferOffset 。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的資料行序數。

trans-unit.source: The index within the row from which to begin the read operation.
trans-unit.target: 若要開始讀取的作業的資料列內的索引。

trans-unit.source: The buffer into which to copy the data.
trans-unit.target: 要將資料複製到其中的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The index with the buffer to which the data will be copied.
trans-unit.target: 將資料複製到其中的緩衝區索引。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的字元數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The actual number of characters read.
trans-unit.target: 實際讀取的字元數目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> object for the requested column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref>物件要求的資料行序數。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的資料行序數。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets name of the data type of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之資料行的資料型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的資料行序數。

trans-unit.target: 表示資料型別名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: The specified cast is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的轉換無效。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> object.

trans-unit.target: 取得指定資料行的值做為雙精確度浮點數。

trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的資料行序數。

trans-unit.target: 指定資料行的值。

trans-unit.target: 指定的轉換無效。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the rows in the data reader.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>可用來逐一查看資料讀取器中的資料列。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Although you can use this method to retrieve an explicit constructor, in languages that support an explicit **foreach** construct, it is simpler to use the looping construct directly in order to iterate through the rows in the data reader.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以使用這個方法來擷取明確建構函式，以語言支援明確**foreach**建構，它是簡單直接以逐一查看資料讀取器中的資料列使用迴圈建構。

trans-unit.source: If you implement this method, it should return a new instance of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbEnumerator> or ensure that your enumerator returns <xref:System.Data.IDataRecord> objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果您實作這個方法時，應該要傳回的新執行個體<xref:System.Data.Common.DbEnumerator>或確定您的列舉值傳回<xref:System.Data.IDataRecord>物件。</xref:System.Data.IDataRecord> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the rows in the data reader.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>可用來逐一查看資料讀取器中的資料列。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.target: 取得當做<xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>的執行個體的指定資料行的值

trans-unit.source: To determine the specific type of the object returned, use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.GetProviderSpecificFieldType%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.

trans-unit.target: 取得所有提供者特定的屬性資料行集合中目前資料列。

trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Object>複製屬性資料行。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.target: 執行個體數目<xref:System.Object>陣列中。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> that describes the column metadata of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>描述的資料行中繼資料<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> that describes the column metadata.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>描述資料行中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader"></xref> is closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader"> </xref>已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data as a <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 擷取資料做為<xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: GetStream only supports the retrieval of values that can be converted to byte arrays.
trans-unit.target: GetStream 只支援擷取可以轉換成位元組陣列的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[SqlClient 串流支援](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data as a <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 擷取資料做為<xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The returned object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The connection drops or is closed during the data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: 連接會卸除或關閉期間擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> is closed during the data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"> </xref>擷取資料時已關閉。

trans-unit.source: There is no data ready to be read (for example, the first <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.Read*> hasn't been called, or returned false). Tried to read a previously-read column in sequential mode. There was an asynchronous operation in progress. This applies to all Get* methods when running in sequential mode, as they could be called while reading a stream.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可供讀取的資料 (例如，第一個<> *> 沒有呼叫，或傳回 false)。 嘗試讀取先前讀取中的資料行循序模式。 沒有進行中的非同步作業。這適用於所有 Get*以循序模式執行，因為它們無法讀取資料流時呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: Trying to read a column that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試讀取不存在的資料行。

trans-unit.source: The returned type was not one of the types below: - binary - image - varbinary - udt
trans-unit.target: 傳回型別不是下列類型之一:-二進位-映像-varbinary-udt

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified column as an instance of <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 取得當做<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>的執行個體的指定資料行的值

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的資料行序數。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 指定資料行的值。

trans-unit.source: The specified cast is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 指定的轉換無效。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data as a <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.
trans-unit.target: 擷取資料做為<xref:System.IO.TextReader>.</xref:System.IO.TextReader>

trans-unit.source: GetTextReader only supports the retrieval of values that can be converted to character arrays (strings).
trans-unit.target: GetTextReader 只支援擷取可以轉換成字元陣列 （字串） 的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[SqlClient 串流支援](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data as a <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.
trans-unit.target: 擷取資料做為<xref:System.IO.TextReader>.</xref:System.IO.TextReader>

trans-unit.source: The returned object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The connection drops or is closed during the data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: 連接會卸除或關閉期間擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> is closed during the data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"> </xref>擷取資料時已關閉。

trans-unit.source: There is no data ready to be read (for example, the first <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.Read*> hasn't been called, or returned false). Tried to read a previously-read column in sequential mode. There was an asynchronous operation in progress. This applies to all Get* methods when running in sequential mode, as they could be called while reading a stream.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可供讀取的資料 (例如，第一個<> *> 沒有呼叫，或傳回 false)。 嘗試讀取先前讀取中的資料行循序模式。 沒有進行中的非同步作業。這適用於所有 Get*以循序模式執行，因為它們無法讀取資料流時呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: Trying to read a column that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試讀取不存在的資料行。

trans-unit.source: The returned type was not one of the types below: - char - nchar - ntext - nvarchar - text - varchar
trans-unit.target: 傳回型別不是下列類型之一:-char-nchar ntext-nvarchar-文字為 varchar

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified column as an instance of <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 取得當做<xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>的執行個體的指定資料行的值

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的資料行序數。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 指定資料行的值。

trans-unit.source: Populates an array of objects with the column values of the current row.
trans-unit.target: 填入物件的陣列與目前資料列的資料行值。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Object> into which to copy the attribute columns.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Object>複製屬性資料行。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The number of instances of <xref:System.Object> in the array.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體數目<xref:System.Object>陣列中。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> contains one or more rows.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否此<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref>包含一或多個資料列。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> contains one or more rows; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref>包含一或多個資料列，否則為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> is closed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref>已關閉。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> is closed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref>已關閉，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader"></xref> is closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader"> </xref>已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the column contains nonexistent or missing values.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出資料行是否包含不存在或遺漏的值。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to check for null column values before calling the typed get methods (for example, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.GetByte%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.GetChar%2A>, and so on) to avoid raising an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法來檢查是否有 null 資料行值，然後再呼叫的型別有 get 的方法 (例如， <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.GetByte%2A>， <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.GetChar%2A>，依此類推) 以避免引發錯誤。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.GetChar%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.GetByte%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的資料行序數。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified column is equivalent to <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref>; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的資料行相當於<xref href="System.DBNull"> </xref>，否則為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous version of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.IsDBNull*>, which gets a value that indicates whether the column contains non-existent or missing values.
trans-unit.target: 非同步版本<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.IsDBNull*>，此 cmdlet 會取得值，指出資料行是否包含不存在或遺漏的值。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.IsDBNull*>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[SqlClient 串流支援](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之以零起始的資料行。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified column value is equivalent to <xref uid="langword_csharp_DBNull" name="DBNull" href=""></xref> otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的資料行值相當於<xref uid="langword_csharp_DBNull" name="DBNull" href=""></xref>否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The connection drops or is closed during the data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: 連接會卸除或關閉期間擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> is closed during the data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"> </xref>擷取資料時已關閉。

trans-unit.source: There is no data ready to be read (for example, the first <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.Read*> hasn't been called, or returned false). Trying to read a previously read column in sequential mode. There was an asynchronous operation in progress. This applies to all Get* methods when running in sequential mode, as they could be called while reading a stream.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可供讀取的資料 (例如，第一個<> *> 沒有呼叫，或傳回 false)。 嘗試讀取循序模式中的先前讀取資料行。 沒有進行中的非同步作業。這適用於所有 Get*以循序模式執行，因為它們無法讀取資料流時呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: Trying to read a column that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試讀取不存在的資料行。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous version of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.IsDBNull*>, which gets a value that indicates whether the column contains non-existent or missing values.
trans-unit.target: 非同步版本<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.IsDBNull*>，此 cmdlet 會取得值，指出資料行是否包含不存在或遺漏的值。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.IsDBNull*>

trans-unit.source: Optionally, sends a notification that operations should be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: （選擇性） 傳送通知，應取消的作業。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[SqlClient 串流支援](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之以零起始的資料行。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation instruction, which propagates a notification that operations should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 取消指令，傳播應該取消作業的通知。

trans-unit.source: This does not guarantee the cancellation.
trans-unit.target: 這不保證取消。

trans-unit.source: A setting of <xref uid="langword_csharp_CancellationToken.None" name="CancellationToken.None" href=""></xref> makes this method equivalent to <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.IsDBNullAsync*>.
trans-unit.target: 如果設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_CancellationToken.None" name="CancellationToken.None" href=""></xref>會使這個方法相當於<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.IsDBNullAsync*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.IsDBNullAsync*>

trans-unit.source: The returned task must be marked as cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的工作必須標示為已取消。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified column value is equivalent to <xref uid="langword_csharp_DBNull" name="DBNull" href=""></xref> otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的資料行值相當於<xref uid="langword_csharp_DBNull" name="DBNull" href=""></xref>否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The connection drops or is closed during the data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: 連接會卸除或關閉期間擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> is closed during the data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"> </xref>擷取資料時已關閉。

trans-unit.source: There is no data ready to be read (for example, the first <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.Read*> hasn't been called, or returned false). Trying to read a previously read column in sequential mode. There was an asynchronous operation in progress. This applies to all Get* methods when running in sequential mode, as they could be called while reading a stream.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可供讀取的資料 (例如，第一個<> *> 沒有呼叫，或傳回 false)。 嘗試讀取循序模式中的先前讀取資料行。 沒有進行中的非同步作業。這適用於所有 Get*以循序模式執行，因為它們無法讀取資料流時呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: Trying to read a column that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試讀取不存在的資料行。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified column as an instance of <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 取得當做<xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>的執行個體的指定資料行的值

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的資料行序數。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 指定資料行的值。

trans-unit.source: The index passed was outside the range of 0 through <xref:System.Data.IDataRecord.FieldCount*>.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞的索引超出範圍 0- <xref:System.Data.IDataRecord.FieldCount*>.</xref:System.Data.IDataRecord.FieldCount*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the specified column as an instance of <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 取得當做<xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>的執行個體的指定資料行的值

trans-unit.source: The name of the column.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified column.
trans-unit.target: 指定資料行的值。

trans-unit.source: No column with the specified name was found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到具有指定名稱的任何資料行。

trans-unit.source: Advances the reader to the next result when reading the results of a batch of statements.
trans-unit.target: 讀取批次的陳述式的結果時，請將讀取器前移至下一個結果。

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to process multiple result sets returned when a batch is submitted to the data provider.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您處理多個批次提交給資料提供者時所傳回的結果集。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there are more result sets; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果有多個結果集;否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous version of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult*>, which advances the reader to the next result when reading the results of a batch of statements. Invokes <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResultAsync*> with CancellationToken.None.
trans-unit.target: 非同步版本<> *>，這將讀取器前移至下一個結果時讀取批次的陳述式的結果。 叫用<> *> 與 CancellationToken.None。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[進行非同步程式設計](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步作業的工作。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: 執行命令文字時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of . Providers should override with an appropriate implementation. The cancellationToken may optionally be ignored. The default implementation invokes the synchronous method and returns a completed task, blocking the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 這是非同步版本<> *>。提供者應該覆寫的適當實作。 cancellationToken （選擇性） 可能會被忽略。 預設實作會叫用同步<> *> 方法，並傳回已完成的工作，並封鎖呼叫的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation will return a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellationToken.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會傳回已取消的工作，如果傳遞已取消 cancellationToken 。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions thrown by <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult*> will be communicated via the returned Task Exception property.
trans-unit.target: 擲回例外狀況<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult*>將經由傳回的工作例外狀況屬性通訊。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.NextResult*>

trans-unit.source: Other methods and properties of the DbDataReader object should not be invoked while the returned Task is not yet completed.
trans-unit.target: 其他方法和 DbDataReader 物件的屬性應該不會叫用時傳回的工作尚未完成。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[進行非同步程式設計](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation instruction.
trans-unit.target: 取消指令。

trans-unit.source: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步作業的工作。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: 執行命令文字時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Advances the reader to the next record in a result set.
trans-unit.target: 將讀取器前移至下一個結果集記錄。

trans-unit.source: The default position of a data reader is before the first record.
trans-unit.target: 資料讀取器的預設位置是在第一個資料錄之前。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call Read to begin accessing data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須呼叫以開始存取資料的讀取。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there are more rows; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果有多個資料列。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous version of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.Read*>, which advances the reader to the next record in a result set. This method invokes <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.ReadAsync*> with CancellationToken.None.
trans-unit.target: 非同步版本<> *>，它將結果集的下一個記錄讀取器。這個方法會叫用<> *> 與 CancellationToken.None。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[進行非同步程式設計](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步作業的工作。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: 執行命令文字時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.Read*>. Providers should override with an appropriate implementation. The cancellationToken may optionally be ignored. The default implementation invokes the synchronous <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.Read*> method and returns a completed task, blocking the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 這是非同步版本<> *>。提供者應該覆寫的適當實作。CancellationToken 可能選擇性地被忽略。 預設實作會叫用同步<> *> 方法，並傳回已完成的工作，並封鎖呼叫的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation will return a cancelled task if passed an already cancelled cancellationToken.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會傳回已取消的工作，如果傳遞已取消的 cancellationToken。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions thrown by Read will be communicated via the returned Task Exception property.
trans-unit.target: 讀取所擲回的例外狀況將經由傳回的工作例外狀況屬性傳送。

trans-unit.source: Do not invoke other methods and properties of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DbDataReader" name="DbDataReader" href=""></xref> object until the returned Task is complete.
trans-unit.target: 不會叫用其他方法和屬性的<xref uid="langword_csharp_DbDataReader" name="DbDataReader" href=""></xref>物件，直到傳回的工作已完成。

trans-unit.source: For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[進行非同步程式設計](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The cancellation instruction.
trans-unit.target: 取消指令。

trans-unit.source: A task representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步作業的工作。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while executing the command text.
trans-unit.target: 執行命令文字時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted by execution of the SQL statement.
trans-unit.target: 取得已變更、 插入或執行 SQL 陳述式所刪除的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: The `RecordsAffected` property is not set until all rows are read and you close the `DataReader`.
trans-unit.target: `RecordsAffected`直到讀取所有資料列，而且您關閉屬性未設定`DataReader`。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 變更、 插入或刪除的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: -1 for SELECT statements; 0 if no rows were affected or the statement failed.
trans-unit.target: SELECT 陳述式;-10，如果沒有資料列受到影響或陳述式失敗。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Data.IDataRecord.GetData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Data.IDataRecord.GetData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.IDataRecord> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Data.IDataRecord>介面。</xref:System.Data.IDataRecord> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based column ordinal.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的資料行序數。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"></xref> to be used when the field points to more remote structured data.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"></xref>欄位指向多項遠端結構化資料時使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of fields in the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> that are not hidden.
trans-unit.target: 取得的欄位數目<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref>不隱藏的。

trans-unit.source: This value is used to determine how many fields in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader> are visible.
trans-unit.target: 這個值用來判斷中有多少欄位<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>可見。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader>

trans-unit.source: For example, a SELECT on a partial primary key returns the remaining parts of the key as hidden fields.
trans-unit.target: 例如，部分的主索引鍵上的 SELECT 會傳回金鑰的其餘部分做為隱藏欄位。

trans-unit.source: The hidden fields are always appended behind the visible fields.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏的欄位永遠會附加在可見欄位。

trans-unit.source: The number of fields that are not hidden.
trans-unit.target: 沒有隱藏的欄位數目。
